    Photo credit: from Book three of Nihāyat al-su’l which gives instructions on using lances. Dated 773/1371 (Add. MS. 18866, f. 113r)

    Sarah Savant

    Sarah Bowen Savant, Associate Professor, AKU-ISMC, and Principle Investigator of KITAB. Dr Savant is a cultural historian specialising in the Middle East and Iran ca. 600-1500. Her work on KITAB is motivated by a desire to write a cultural history of the Arabic book using digital tools. Her publications include three monographs and numerous articles treating ethnic identity, cultural memory, genealogy, and history writing.

    • London, UK
    • Email
    • Twitter
    • Facebook
    • GitHub
